BasicInfo.short: Cloudscaling is a cloud infrastructure, supporting application development and deployment of enterprises and web application providers.

Products.name: Open Cloud System
Products.description: Open Cloud System 2.5 is a complete Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) solution powered by OpenStack technology.
